# Loading Spatial data

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=4, fig.width=6}

setwd("/data/10x_data/10x_visium/")
source("00.import.R")

mob164315 <- readRDS("./output/mob164315.rds")
clusters <- c("Granule Cell Layer (GCL+RMS)","Mitral Cell Layer (MCL)","Outer plexiform Layer (EPL)","Glomerular Layer (GL)","Olfactory Nerve Layer (ONL)")

```

# Add Nanopore data: ISO, ISOG, JUNC and EDIT assays

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=6, fig.width=8}

all = read.delim("./nanopore/mob164315_genematrix.txt", stringsAsFactors = F)
data = all[,2:ncol(all)]
colnames(data) <- paste(colnames(data),"-1", sep="")
rownames(data) <- all$geneId
vect <- colnames(mob164315@assays$Spatial)
data <- data[vect]
mob164315[["ISOG"]] <- CreateAssayObject(counts = data)
mob164315 <- NormalizeData(object = mob164315, assay = "ISOG")
mob164315 <- ScaleData(object = mob164315, assay = "ISOG")

all = read.delim("./nanopore/mob164315_isomatrix.txt", stringsAsFactors = F)
data = all[,3:ncol(all)]
colnames(data) <- paste(colnames(data),"-1", sep="")
rownames(data) = paste(all$geneId, all$transcriptId, sep="..")
vect <- colnames(mob164315@assays$Spatial)
idx <- grep("undef", rownames(data), invert = TRUE)
data <- data[idx,vect]
dim(data)
mob164315[["ISO"]] <- CreateAssayObject(counts = data)
mob164315 <- NormalizeData(object = mob164315, assay = "ISO")
mob164315 <- scale_my_data(mob164315, assay = "ISO")

all = read.delim("./nanopore/mob164315_juncmatrix.txt", stringsAsFactors = F)
data = all[,2:ncol(all)]
colnames(data) <- paste(colnames(data),"-1", sep="")
rownames(data) = str_replace(all$junctionId, ":", "..")
vect <- colnames(mob164315@assays$Spatial)
data <- data[,vect]
dim(data)
data <- data[which(Matrix::rowSums(data)>9),]
dim(data)

mob164315[["JUNC"]] <- CreateAssayObject(counts = data)
mob164315 <- NormalizeData(object = mob164315, assay = "JUNC")
mob164315 <- scale_my_data(mob164315, assay = "JUNC")

all = read.delim("./nanopore/mob164315.snp100838.RN3.QV5_snpmatrix.full.txt", stringsAsFactors = F)
data = all[,4:ncol(all)]
dim(data)
colnames(data) <- paste(colnames(data),"-1", sep="")
rownames(data) = paste(all$geneId, all$transcriptId, sep=":")
vect <- colnames(mob164315@assays$Spatial)
#idx <- grep("intergenic", rownames(data), invert = TRUE)
#data <- data[idx,vect]
#idx <- grep("Rik", rownames(data), invert = TRUE)
data <- data[,vect]
idx1 <- grep("\\.\\.A", rownames(data))
idx2 <- grep("\\.\\.G", rownames(data))
data <- data[c(idx1,idx2),]
dim(data)

x <- unique(sapply(strsplit(rownames(data), "\\.\\."), `[`, 1))
countA <- data[grep("\\.\\.A",rownames(data)),]
colnames(countA) <- colnames(data)
rownames(countA) <- x
countG <- data[grep("\\.\\.G",rownames(data)),]
colnames(countG) <- colnames(data)
rownames(countG) <- x
ratio <- countG/(countA+countG)

mob164315[['AtoI_A']] <- Matrix::colSums(countA)
mob164315[['AtoI_G']] <- Matrix::colSums(countG)
mob164315[['AtoI_total']] <- mob164315[['AtoI_A']]+mob164315[['AtoI_G']]
mob164315[['AtoI_ratio']] <- mob164315[['AtoI_G']]/mob164315[['AtoI_total']]
mob164315[['AtoI_detected']] <- Matrix::colSums(countG > 0)

mob164315[["AtoI"]] <- CreateAssayObject(counts = countA)
mob164315 <- SetAssayData(mob164315, slot = "data", as.matrix(countG), assay = "AtoI")
mob164315 <- SetAssayData(mob164315, slot = "scale.data", as.matrix(ratio), assay = "AtoI")

saveRDS(mob164315, "./output/mob164315.nanopore.rds")

```
